Articles.Content:
Hi,

I discovered KSP about 2 weeks ago and immediately went and bought the full version. I have to say that this game is amazing and I'm already addicted . I hope this is the right place for newbie questions because I find the general discussion forum somewhat over my skill level (until yesterday I didn't even know about quicksave ).

Well I am glad you found KSP, I basically threw my wallet at the screen when I got the demo! This is not exactly the place to ask questions, only for an introduction. The General Discussion might be confusing but it is quickly understandable, most people there describe it in a manor anyone can understand (I say anyone as in if you know about the game). I am glad to see you here!

Laugh a little it makes the 'splosions more awesome!
